review: Adding the ability to simply cast Amazon Prime Video is the only thing I wish I could change about my Chromecast.  If Amazon would step up and write an app for Chromecast, I would be completely satisified.  Well, now that i think about it, I do wish Netflix would make its Chromecast app play multiple consecutive episodes of a show without requiring user input each time too.Chromecast is a great little device at an excellent price, and I am really glad that I bought one even though I already had a streaming Panasonic Blu-Ray player with more apps than my Chromecast had in the beginning. Chromecast has fewer hiccups than my Panasonic Blu-Ray player, reacts more quickly to my input, has a better user interface overall, and allows me to stream shows directly from Chrome.If an Amazon app were available for Chromecast, it would be the perfect streaming device for me.  As it is, I end up using Chromecast with Netflix, YouTube, other apps, and Chrome, while watching fewer and fewer Amazon Prime Videos.  I could watch Amazon videos with my streaming Blu-Ray player, but using Chromecast is so much easier.And when I'm not streaming with Chromecast, I often enjoy the beautiful slide show it displays.
author: Pam

review: Got my chromecast and it worked great for 2 weeks and then crashed. It only shows a black screen and won't cast anything from netflix, hulu, or youtube. When trying to contact Google about it, it sends you in a loop. It says that they honor a 1 year warranty and you need to contact Google plus support, but when you contact Google plus support it doesn't offer any links for warranty claims and when you click on return it says the return is only valid if purchased through Google plus.Very lame and the worst of customer service. The chromecast is a scam and I would not be surprised if they had all workers at Google write reviews to seem the product is amazing and trending.AVOID AT ALL COST. I will be buying a Apple TV today as the $35 I spent on the Chromecast cannot be returned to Amazon as the timeframe has expired and is not handled under any warranty by Google Plus.
